snippet: A federal district judge reinforces that the health reform law was designed to provide quality, affordable health care for “all” Americans.
abstract: Editorial welcomes decision by federal Judge Paul Friedman to dismiss lawsuit filed against the health care reform law; contends decision deserves to be upheld.
lead_paragraph: A federal district judge reinforces that the health reform law was designed to provide quality, affordable health care for “all” Americans.

headline.main: Health Care Reform Survives a Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Health Care Reform Survives a Lawsuit

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
